team_members.name: Kushal Shah
team_members.bio: Kushal is a multidisciplinary technologist driving UTMT’s digital direction. With a background spanning education, data science, and design, he creates tools that translate complexity into clarity, aiming to bridge the digital divide through empathy-driven innovation.

team_members.name: Preeti Shukla
team_members.bio: Preeti brings a rich background in language education. At UTMT, she plays a crucial role in nurturing learners’ expression and clarity. With experience in curriculum design, she empowers students to connect ideas meaningfully.

team_members.name: Prof. Kalpesh Kapoor
team_members.bio: Specializing in advanced mathematical modeling and data science, Prof. Kapoor enriches our curriculum with insights into modern data analysis techniques from his roles at IISER Pune and IIT Guwahati.

team_members.name: Dr. Anish Roychowdhury
team_members.role: Associate Director of Data Science, Plaksha University
team_members.bio: Dr. Anish is a seasoned Data Science professional with 20+ years in industry and academia. He excels in leading digital transformations and has deep expertise in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Generative AI, dedicated to advancing Data Science education.

team_members.name: Dr. S. Balaji
team_members.bio: Dr. Balaji brings extensive expertise in Mechanical Engineering from IIT Madras. His research and teaching focus on thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, and manufacturing processes, contributing valuable insights to our programs.

team_members.name: Nagapranay Tumuluri
team_members.bio: Nagapranay is a skilled professional with a strong background in data analysis and machine learning applications. He contributes to UTMT by mentoring students, developing course content, and leading projects.

team_members.name: Vibhanshu G
team_members.role: Founder, TakeOff Talent | AI & Data Science Lead | Mentor
team_members.bio: Vibhanshu is a Data Science and AI leader with 9+ years of experience, specializing in building impactful AI products and talent solutions. As Founder of TakeOff Talent, he helps companies hire top tech talent swiftly and mentors professionals in their data science careers.

team_members.name: Arvind Sivdas
team_members.bio: Arvind is an experienced leader in technology and product development, known for scaling tech platforms and driving product innovation. He supports UTMT by advising on tech strategy and mentoring product teams.

support_pillars.title: Teaching Assistance
support_pillars.description: Dedicated mentors providing personalized guidance and support throughout your learning journey.

support_pillars.title: Technical Support
support_pillars.description: 24/7 technical assistance to ensure uninterrupted access to our digital learning resources.

support_pillars.title: Student Services
support_pillars.description: Comprehensive support for all student needs, from enrollment to certification and placement.

support_pillars.title: Curriculum Development
support_pillars.description: Continuously updated course materials aligned with industry requirements and educational standards.
